    • searchProductsByCriteria

      public List<ProductDTO> searchProductsByCriteria(String animalTypes, String animalAges, String foodType, String careProducts, String toys, String accessories, String brand)
      Searches for products based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      animalTypes - the type of animal for which products are being searched
      animalAges - the age group of the animal
      foodType - the type of food product
      careProducts - the type of care products
      toys - the type of toys
      accessories - the type of accessories
      brand - the brand of the products
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDTO objects matching the specified criteria
